amendment.description: To allow children in foster care to receive services under the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 while their families (including foster families) are taking necessary action to comply with immunization and other health and safety requirements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2813 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2813 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2813 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2813 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Landrieu.
